title: Just For Now
description: She’s half my ageAnd my only hope of saving my tour.On top of all that, I don’t sleep with women who work for me, so I have no business entertaining fantasies of my new, ball-busting tour manager.But she’s smart. And sassy.And gorgeous.She’s only working for me temporarily—a fact she makes clear as often as possible. She’s on loan while her “real” band is on a break.So why should I deny myself the first woman I’ve wanted in far too long?If you love hot rock stars, age gap romance, and no-strings flings that turn into more, grab this swoony rock star romance between a seasoned rocker and his sassy new tour manager today!
author: Jerica MacMillan
